text:
AirAsia Berhad: Make the ICAO certifications available to the public
Referring to Malaysia Airports Holdings Berhad’s (MAHB) statement published yesterday with the headline ‘Every Measure Taken to Ensure Public Safety at klia2’, the airport operator was Quote: d that it has received the Aerodrome Certification for klia2 by the Department of Civil Aviation (DCA) and that IKRAM Premier Consulting and the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) have both certified klia2 as safe.
AirAsia Berhad would like to invite Malaysia Airports Holding Berhad to make all of the alleged certifications available publicly, especially the full certification from ICAO and full report from IKRAM.
For the record, AirAsia has repeatedly requested for these documents from MAHB for over a year. AirAsia Berhad management is puzzled as to why MAHB is extremely hesitant to make the documents public to the members of the media, the public and especially the airport operator’s biggest client at klia2 if indeed MAHB has received them.
We hope this simple request will be met with the appropriate response by MAHB.
